formattedAddress: 300 W 122nd St, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 300 W 122nd St, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text: I have been collecting in earnest since 2017, and have collected over 70 works.  I got my collection insured and the insurer connected me with Gabrielle.  I cannot talk about how great it has been to work with her.  She has been flexible and patient, taking time to explain what she looks at for valuations and details on each aspect of the process.  I've been fortunate to collect a couple of artists with much higher price points for their work than when I bought them.  Once I was able to get the appraisal, the insurance company had everything they've needed to insure it at the appreciated value.  I have recommended her to several friends which are also collectors, and I recommend her to you as well.

originalText.text: Gabrielle did a great job with our appraisal. She asked smart questions and found a way to do the work with a minimum of cost and overhead. The final reports are detailed and clear. Will be using her for any valuations we have in the future!

text.text: Gabrielle did a great job with our appraisal. She asked smart questions and found a way to do the work with a minimum of cost and overhead. The final reports are detailed and clear. Will be using her for any valuations we have in the future!

originalText.text: 5 STAR service! Amazing expertise and communication. Gabrielle was consultative, thorough and delivered an incredibly detailed appraisal centered on real data and facts about my art work. I recommend

originalText.text: Worked with Gabrielle to appraise highly valuable and rare work from an African-American master artist. She was very knowledgeable, prompt and professional when it came to full discovery and communication of her findings. Would work with her again absolutely

text.text: Worked with Gabrielle to appraise highly valuable and rare work from an African-American master artist. She was very knowledgeable, prompt and professional when it came to full discovery and communication of her findings. Would work with her again absolutely

originalText.text: Gabrielle recently did an appraisal for a few pieces of my collection for insurance purposes. She did a great job. Fairly priced and very attentive and timely to my concerns with the job. Would highly recommend.
